meanings.sent1: The sky was the rosiniest I had ever seen at sunset.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks were the rosiniest in the room.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's cheeks turned rosiniest when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent4: The rosiniest hue of the flowers reminded me of a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The rosiniest glow of the sunrise painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: Most resembling or characteristic of roses.
meanings.sent1: The rosiniest scent filled the garden in full bloom.
meanings.sent2: The dress had the rosiniest color, just like a rose.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with the rosiniest frosting, looking like a bouquet of roses.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had the rosiniest tone, soft and delicate like a rose petal.
meanings.sent5: The rosiniest petals of the flower glistened with morning dew, resembling fresh roses.
